'''Land of Plenty's Contention''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Land of Plenty's Contention is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest at a camp in [[Atocpan]], [[Natlan]] after defeating enemies: <!-- Near the westernmost Teleport Waypoint on the mainland -->
{{Enemy List|Ferocious Warrior: Grappler;Ferocious Warrior: Human Ram*2;Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser}}
